analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_chucks/47/0x21dc1c2da6a347b44857a2fe7455a085d9b08dc6.sol#105) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/47/0x21dc1c2da6a347b44857a2fe7455a085d9b08dc6.sol#132-138)

Electrim.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x21dc1c2da6a347b44857a2fe7455a085d9b08dc6.sol#222-225)
ElectrimToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x21dc1c2da6a347b44857a2fe7455a085d9b08dc6.sol#36)
Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x21dc1c2da6a347b44857a2fe7455a085d9b08dc6.sol#105)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/47/0x21dc1c2da6a347b44857a2fe7455a085d9b08dc6.sol:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
